reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Technical support fund to identify and formulate interventions in the tax area in Lebanon

description.narrative: L'iniziativa ha come obiettivo fornire supporto tecnico per il Ministero dell finanze in Libano per la formulazione di interventi nel settore fiscale in Libano
The initiative aims to provide technical support for the Ministry of Finance in Lebanon for the formulation of interventions in the tax area in Lebanon

sector.narrative: PUBLIC SECTOR POLICY AND ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT

tag.narrative: Realize timely implementation of duty-free and quota-free market access on a lasting basis for all least developed countries, consistent with World Trade Organization decisions, including by ensuring that preferential rules of origin applicable to imports from least developed countries are transparent and simple, and contribute to facilitating market access
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
